author: News 3 Staff
title: chevron-right
text: {p}HEADLINE: Mild weather continues{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 43{ } { } { } { } NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 61{ } { } { } NORMAL HIGH: 57{/p}{p}What a great start to 2024 with highs reaching the lower 60s across most of the valley under mostly sunny skies.{/p}{p}Skies remain mostly clear overnight along with cool temperatures, mainly in the lower 40s.{/p}{p}A quick moving storm system will arrive early Wednesday with a decent chance for showers and mountain snow through very early Thursday morning.{/p}{p}Rainfall amounts for the valley will remain low, around .10\" or so.{/p}{p}Snowfall, above 8,000 feet, will range from 3\" to 6\" especially in the Spring Mountains.{/p}{p}I expect a Winter Weather Advisory to be issued by the National Weather Service so stay tuned for more updates.{/p}{p}Temperatures will also come crashing down into the lower 50s by Thursday.{/p}{p}Another winter storm is on track for next weekend so stay tuned with even colder air to deal with.{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 71% (115% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1068 feet compared to 1044 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2024: 0.00\" (-0.02\" below normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through January 1st, 2023: 0.12\" (+0.10\" above normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - HEALTHY{/p}{p}-Bill Bellis{/p}{p}At least one person is injured following a crash on the west side of the valley Monday morning.{/p}{p}Fast cams in the area show three vehicles involved, including a white car and a red pickup, which are blocking Sahara Ave near Lindell Road.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1741888448133300585\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 | {a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/pedestrian-in-critical-condition-after-colliding-with-vehicle-in-east-las-vegas-2015-nissan-rogue-crosswalk-sunrise-hospital-lvmpd\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/pedestrian-in-critical-condition-after-colliding-with-vehicle-in-east-las-vegas-2015-nissan-rogue-crosswalk-sunrise-hospital-lvmpd\"}Pedestrian in critical condition after colliding with vehicle in east Las Vegas{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}The Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department confirmed there was a{ }\"significant injury\" and detectives were currently investigating.{br}{/p}{p}No other information has been provided at this time.{/p}{p}Motorists are advised to avoid the area and seek alternate routes.{/p}{p}{strong}{em}This is a developing story. Check back for updates.{/em}{/strong}{/p}{p}HEADLINE: Mild weather continues{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 43{ } { } { } { } NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 61{ } { } { } NORMAL HIGH: 57{/p}{p}What a great start to 2024 with highs reaching the lower 60s across most of the valley under mostly sunny skies.{/p}{p}Skies remain mostly clear overnight along with cool temperatures, mainly in the lower 40s.{/p}{p}A quick moving storm system will arrive early Wednesday with a decent chance for showers and mountain snow through very early Thursday morning.{/p}{p}Rainfall amounts for the valley will remain low, around .10\" or so.{/p}{p}Snowfall, above 8,000 feet, will range from 3\" to 6\" especially in the Spring Mountains.{/p}{p}I expect a Winter Weather Advisory to be issued by the National Weather Service so stay tuned for more updates.{/p}{p}Temperatures will also come crashing down into the lower 50s by Thursday.{/p}{p}Another winter storm is on track for next weekend so stay tuned with even colder air to deal with.{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 71% (115% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1068 feet compared to 1044 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2024: 0.00\" (-0.02\" below normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through January 1st, 2023: 0.12\" (+0.10\" above normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - HEALTHY{/p}{p}-Bill Bellis{/p}{p}At least one person is injured following a crash on the west side of the valley Monday morning.{/p}{p}Fast cams in the area show three vehicles involved, including a white car and a red pickup, which are blocking Sahara Ave near Lindell Road.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1741888448133300585\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 | {a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/pedestrian-in-critical-condition-after-colliding-with-vehicle-in-east-las-vegas-2015-nissan-rogue-crosswalk-sunrise-hospital-lvmpd\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/pedestrian-in-critical-condition-after-colliding-with-vehicle-in-east-las-vegas-2015-nissan-rogue-crosswalk-sunrise-hospital-lvmpd\"}Pedestrian in critical condition after colliding with vehicle in east Las Vegas{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}The Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department confirmed there was a{ }\"significant injury\" and detectives were currently investigating.{br}{/p}{p}No other information has been provided at this time.{/p}{p}Motorists are advised to avoid the area and seek alternate routes.{/p}{p}{strong}{em}This is a developing story. Check back for updates.{/em}{/strong}{/p}
